if you've lost your secret key, and all means to revoke your key, then you have absolutely no chance to recover data encrypted with it

do you know anything about public key encryption?
I suggest you look at it.
basically you need to generate a new key pair, delete the old one forget it ever existed... then export the secret key somewhere ... REALLY REALLY REALLY safe where noone can get at it
the beauty of the system is that you can give your public key to anyone and everyone, and they can encrypt stuff that you can only decrypt with your secret key
